name: Toledo
fun_fact: Fun fact: Toledo's famous marzipan was invented by nuns at Convento de San Clemente in the Middle Ages, and you can still buy the original recipe through a rotating wooden shelf at the cloistered convent!

hero_dishes.where_to_find: Traditional tabernas near Plaza de Zocodover, served as tapas
